department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Degree of Master of Arts in Regional Studies - East Asia
department.dept_short_name: Russia, Eastern Europe, and Central Asia

course.course_group: Regional Studies _ Russia, Eastern Europe, and Central Asia
course.title: Master's Thesis Reading and Research
course.faculty_text: Alexandra Vacroux and members of the Faculty
course.description: Interdisciplinary proseminar designed to orient master's degree students in Regional Studies-Russia, Eastern Europe, and Central Asia to theoretical and methodological approaches in the field, including research design for academic and policy research.
course.notes: This course must be taken for letter grade.
